title: Tanks
body:
Why the fuk do people that play mid and adc not realise that when you play against a team full of tanks you have to rush Liandrys and void, botrk and Lw????

please help my pain

replies.body: Because people don't realise that killing the damage dealer is more important than killing the low damage tank. I believe that people sometimes forget that there is a Caitlyn chunking them down while they hit the Zac that is literally laughing at them while they do crap all damage to him.

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=AznJcNl3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-19T01:56:10.685+0000)
>
> Because people don't realise that killing the damage dealer is more important than killing the low damage tank. I believe that people sometimes forget that there is a Caitlyn chunking them down while they hit the Zac that is literally laughing at them while they do crap all damage to him.

unless you know, they are fed, go ap/ad (zac full ap - monster)
Yeah, but Zac full AP isn't really a tank. He has more base health than normal, but that goes out the window really quick with no resistances.
not that it has much more effect when your not lucian, kek
